solution_line_template: She gave {total_lemons_bought} x {fraction_given} = <<{total_lemons_bought}*{fraction_given}={lemons_given_to_neighbor}>>{lemons_given_to_neighbor} lemons to her neighbor.
So, Cristine is left with {total_lemons_bought} - {lemons_given_to_neighbor} = <<{total_lemons_bought}-{lemons_given_to_neighbor}={lemons_left}>>{lemons_left} lemons.
